Free Michaels Application Online
Michaels application online - Originally located in the Texas area Michaels only had sixteen companies to their reputation. In 1985 that all changed when the company became a publicly traded company.
Michaels job application online is easy to fill out. Register free, create your profile and work experience, then search for all available jobs (in all industries) in your zip code, then apply instantly TO ALL OF THEM AT THE SAME TIME!
Within a decade Michaels had grown to over 500 stores and had taken their place as the largest arts and crafts retailer in all of North America.
You may also be interested in our-
TJ Maxx Job Application , McDonalds Job Application , Walmart Job Application Online , Fedex Job Application , KFC Job Application
Michaels employees, ranging from the store associate all the way to the corporate leaders, receive competitive wages and a comprehensive benefits package. Each eligible employee is given a package with select the benefits that are right for them.
Michaels online application job benefits.
All Michaels associates, whether they are full time or part time, receive a 25% discount card that can be used on all full priced items in the store (with restrictions of course). Eligible employees can receive medical, dental and vision insurance. They also receive long and short term disability and accidental death and dismemberment insurance. Eligible employees also get vacation, sick and personal days as well as paid holidays among other benefits and perks. Apply at Michaels Application Online Michaels jobs&careers- click here
- Click here- Find a New Job with the Beyond.com Career Network- Click here to start now! Printable Michaels Part Time Job Application If you would like to fill out a standard Michaels Job Application and walk into your local Michaels and hand it in, directly to the manager, you can download a printable Michaels part time job application here (right click and"save as" )
